113  struct Light {
114  EIGEN_MAKE_ALIGNED_OPERATOR_NEW
115 
116  vistle::Vector4 position;
117 
118  vistle::Vector4 ambient;
119  vistle::Vector4 diffuse;
120  vistle::Vector4 specular;
121 
122  vistle::Vector3 attenuation;
123  vistle::Scalar spotCutoff;
124  vistle::Vector3 direction;
125  vistle::Scalar spotExponent;
126 
127  mutable vistle::Vector4 transformedPosition;
128  mutable vistle::Vector3 transformedDirection;
129  bool enabled;
130  mutable bool isDirectional;
131 
132  bool operator==(const Light &rhs) const {
133 
134  if (position != rhs.position)
135  return false;
136  if (attenuation != rhs.attenuation)
137  return false;
138  if (ambient != rhs.ambient)
139  return false;
140  if (diffuse != rhs.diffuse)
141  return false;
142  if (specular != rhs.specular)
143  return false;
144  if (direction != rhs.direction)
145  return false;
146  if (spotCutoff != rhs.spotCutoff)
147  return false;
148  if (spotExponent != rhs.spotExponent)
149  return false;
150  if (enabled != rhs.enabled)
151  return false;
152 
153  return true;
154  }

213  struct ViewParameters {
214  vistle::Matrix4 head;
215  vistle::Matrix4 proj;
216  vistle::Matrix4 view;
217  vistle::Matrix4 model;
218  uint32_t frameNumber;
219  uint32_t requestNumber;
220  int32_t timestep = -1;
221  double matrixTime;
222  int width, height;
223  uint8_t eye = 0;
224 
225  ViewParameters()
226  : frameNumber(0)
227  , requestNumber(0)
228  , timestep(-1)
229  , matrixTime(0.)
230  , width(1)
231  , height(1)
232  {
233  head = vistle::Matrix4::Identity();
234  proj = vistle::Matrix4::Identity();
235  view = vistle::Matrix4::Identity();
236  model = vistle::Matrix4::Identity();
237  }
